description: Improve show command with subtasks and parent display
context:
The show command needs to display relationships:

1. PARENT TASK (if this task has one):
   - Show parent at the top: 'Parent: abc123 - Parent description'
   - Make it clear this is a subtask

2. SUBTASKS (if this task has any):
   - Show after main task details
   - Use tree display similar to list
   - Show status, ID, description (truncated)

Example:
Parent: abc123 - Implement authentication

[ ] def456 [p0]: Add login endpoint

Context:
  Implement POST /login endpoint...

Subtasks (2 pending, 1 completed):
├── [x] ghi789: Create login form (2h ago)
├── [ ] jkl012: Add validation
└── [ ] mno345: Write tests

Be thoughtful about layout and readability.
result: Added parent display at top, subtasks section with tree characters, sorted by priority/status
